channel.title: Help Please - Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
channel.description: What does this mean please? and how do i fix it? :( :mad:

item.title: Help Please - Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

It usually is already set up.

Read full topic

@OwnerShadow wrote:

He must make shure its port forwarded to 5555 aswell

item.source: Help Please - Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

item.title: Help Please - Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Go into Server.Java.

Search for

public static server clientHandler = null;

You should see

public static server clientHandler = null; // handles all the clients public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null; public static boolean shutdownServer = false; // set this to true in order to shut down and kill the server public static boolean shutdownClientHandler; // signals ClientHandler to shut down public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

Change the 43594 after ‘serverlistenerPort =’ to 5555

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

Save & compile, your port is now 5555.

Read full topic
